bs-uemodulebookpdf-pref-bookexporttoc:
Label for the header of the table of contents select input setting.
{{Identical|Table of contents}}
bs-uemodulebookpdf-bookexporttoc-only-ar: Label of the "only-articles" option for the table of contents select input setting
bs-uemodulebookpdf-bookexporttoc-article: Label of the "article-tocs" option for the table of contents select input setting
bs-uemodulebookpdf-overview-description: Short description for the "bookpdf" export module
bs-uemodulebookpdf-overview-bodycontent: Full description for the "bookpdf" export module
bs-uemodulebookpdf-btn-export:
Label for the button, that triggers the export to PDF.
{{Identical|Portable Document Format (PDF)}}
bs-uemodulebookpdf-bookshelfimage:
Image display name. Bookshelf is the short name of the BlueSpiceBookshelf extension and should not be translated.
{{Identical|Bookshelf Image}}
bs-uemodulebookpdf-table-of-contents-hea:
Header for the table of contents section.
{{Identical|Table of contents}}
